title: ContextJS Provider Manifest
description: Defines templates and CLI command handlers for a ContextJS provider package.

$schema.description: The URL of the JSON schema file that validates this manifest.

name.description: The NPM package name of the provider (should match package.json).

commands.description: A mapping of CLI command names.

templates.description: A map of template IDs to template definitions provided by this package.

title.description: A human-friendly display name for the template.

path.description: Relative path (from package root) to the template's root folder.

description.description: A longer description for the template.

commands.description: A mapping of CLI command names (e.g. 'new', 'build') to their handler script definitions.

additionalProperties.description: Definition of a single template available from this provider.

path.description: Path to the handler file for this command.
